summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds to a portion of Sections 29 and 32, in Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Block 5, Lindsley's Mineral springs Plat; and Tracts 1, 4 and 5, Meridian Avenue Acres, for street purposes and laying off Meridian Avenue North and North Northgate Way (Meridian Avenue North, et al, Widening).
